text: Nta ntumwa nâ€™imwe cyangwa umuhanuzi twohereje mbere yawe (yewe Muhamadi) ngo asome (ibyo yahishuriwe), maze ngo Shitani ibure gushyira urujijo mu byo yasomye (kugira ngo ibuze abantu gukurikiza ibyo basomewe). Nuko Allah agakuramo urwo rujijo Shitani yateje, hanyuma Allah agashimangira amagambo ye. Kandi Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye
